def.name: Client's age is less than 6 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 6 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 6 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 6 weeks-40

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3 doses: 3 primary doses without a booster dose (3p)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3 doses with booster dose: 3 primary doses with a booster dose (3p+1)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.2 doses with booster dose: 2 primary doses with a booster dose (2p+1)

def.name: No Hib primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No Hib primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No Hib primary series doses were administered-123

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3 doses: 3 primary doses without a booster dose (3p)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3 doses with booster dose: 3 primary doses with a booster dose (3p+1)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.2 doses with booster dose: 2 primary doses with a booster dose (2p+1)

a:s.a:s: "Number of Hib Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Hib Primary Series Doses Administered
